General.Name: PJP Makrum S.A.
General.Description: PJP Makrum S.A. engages in docking solutions, and steel and industrial construction activities in Poland and internationally. The company produces, sells, and services dock levellers, loading ramps, dock shelters, sectional industrial doors, and high-speed shutters. It is also involved in the manufacture of steel constructions for power, chemical, and environmental industries; and construction of office buildings, shopping centers, supermarkets, and residential buildings. The company was founded in 1948 and is based in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
